<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Medusa's Wrath](/Feats.aspx?ID=1757) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 130 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
ki spells

</column>

---

You learn a monstrous ki technique that infuses your blows with the petrifying power of a medusa's gaze. You gain the [_medusa's wrath_](/Spells.aspx?ID=739) ki spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.
name: Medusa's Wrath
